name: Baldi's Basics Plus 2D (Itch Edition)
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

SPACE to interact with items and things

Click the item box or use the number keys to use an item

M, \, ENTER, or Q to open map.

Hold R to sprint.

CLICK while pointing mouse to use the grapple hook

Press SPACE to jumprope

Press the equal key to open the command interface, type "close" to close this command screen

Baldi's Basics Plus and Baldi's Basics Classic by Basically Games, graphics by me and Basically Games, sounds and music by Basically Games, code by me. All other audio and music from their original owners.

Made with Scratch

If your game does not work for whatever reason, click on the link below:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/723639385/
